GalPRIME Plotting Methods

GalPRIME does have a set of in-suite plotting methods. Many of these are still works in progress, and your mileage with using them may vary.

Cutout Plots

view_cutouts(cutouts, output='', dpi=150, show_index=False, log_scale=False, zscale=True, limits=(1, -3), cmap='magma_r')[source]

Generate cutouts plot for input filename

Matrix Plot

adjust_profile(x, y, clean=False, shift=0.0)[source]
load_median_info(filename)[source]
matrix_plot(directory, x_bins, y_bins, stubs=['bare', 'bgadded', 'noisy', 'bgsub'], colours=['red', 'blue', 'green', 'violet'], extra_params='_0.0-0.5')[source]

Single Bin Plots

adjust_profile(x, y, m_0=27, arcconv=0.168)[source]
single_bin_plot(table_arrays, colours=None, ind_profile_alpha=1, medians=False, to_sb=True, bootstraps=False, ylim=(30, 20), xlabel=None, ylabel=None, output='', dpi=150)[source]
single_prof(x, y, error=None)[source]
